sentences.en: ...a staggering $900 million in short- and long-term debt.
sentences.cn: …令人震惊的9亿美元的短长期债务。
他晃 晃悠 悠地往前走.

sentences.en: He was staggering across the room and had obviously had a few.
sentences.cn: 他在房间里摇摇晃晃地走着,很显然他已喝醉了.

sentences.en: He was staggering and had to lean on the bar.
sentences.cn: 他走路摇摇晃晃，不得不靠在吧台上。

sentences.en: Job applications from disable workers poured in at a staggering rate.
sentences.cn: 残废工人求职申请书大批涌来、数量惊人.

sentences.en: Job applications from disabled workers poured in at a staggering rate.
sentences.cn: 残废工人求职申请书大批涌来.

sentences.en: Natalie! This is so staggering, and wonderful. What are you doing here?
sentences.cn: 娜塔丽,真是万万想不到 啊! 你在这儿干什么?

sentences.en: Profits have shot up by a staggering 25 %.
The cost was a staggering $10 million.
sentences.cn: 费用竟高达 1,000 万美元。

sentences.en: The financial impact on the town was staggering.
sentences.cn: 对这个镇所造成的财政影响令人惊诧。

sentences.en: The public response was absolutely staggering.
sentences.cn: 公众的反应非常令人惊愕.

sentences.en: The results from this unit are staggering.
sentences.cn: 这个团队得出的结果令人吃惊。

sentences.en: The results have been quite staggering.
The staggering problems of poverty remain unresolved.
sentences.cn: 令人震惊的贫困问题仍未解决.

sentences.en: The variety of goods that the peddlers sold was staggering.
sentences.cn: 小商贩们卖的商品种类繁多.

sentences.en: This figure rises to a staggering 60 % of men in their sixties.
sentences.cn: 而到60岁这个年龄段,这个数字上升到令人惊愕的60%.

sentences.en: Why is that man staggering about the room like that?
sentences.cn: 那人为什么那样摇摇晃晃地在屋里走来走去?

words.tran_cn: 蹒跚的；另人惊愕的；犹豫的

trans.tran_cn: 难以置信的，令人震惊的，蹒跚的，犹豫的
蹒跚(stagger的现在分词)，使…感到震惊[担心]，错开
